author: Adam Vjestica
title: Which online food delivery services have slots right now?
description: Supermarkets are under strain as more people search for online food delivery services.
content:
With the government strictly advising that everyone must now stay at home to help combat the spread of coronavirus, ordering food online has now become more relevant than ever.
